# 1. Load Packages
```{r}
library(brms)
library(marginaleffects)
library(tidyverse)



options(scipen = 999)

set.seed(180822)

set_priors <- c(prior(normal(0, 1), class = b),
                prior(normal(0, 1), class = sd))
```

# 2. Load Data
```{r}
load("cccu_MA.RData")

cccu_MA <- cccu_MA %>%
  arrange(CASEID) %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_MA_hc_only <- cccu_MA %>%
  filter(hc == "hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)

cccu_MA_nonhc_only <- cccu_MA %>%
  filter(hc == "non_hc") %>%
  mutate_if(is.factor, droplevels)
  
```

# 3. Load models of main analysis
```{r}
m1 <- brm(file = "models/m1.Rds")
m2 <- brm(file = "models/m2.Rds")
m2_hc_only <- brm(file = "models/m2_hc_only.Rds")
m2_nonhc_only <- brm(file = "models/m2_nonhc_only.Rds")
m3 <- brm(file = "models/m3.Rds")
m3_hc_only <- brm(file = "models/m3_hc_only.Rds")
m3_nonhc_only <- brm(file = "models/m3_nonhc_only.Rds")
m4 <- brm(file = "models/m4.Rds")
m4_hc_only <- brm(file = "models/m4_hc_only.Rds")
m4_nonhc_only <- brm(file = "models/m4_nonhc_only.Rds")
```

# 4. Compute Average marginal effects

## m1
```{r}
#average marginal effect
ame <- marginaleffects(m1)
ame_sum <- summary(ame, conf_level = .997)
print(ame_sum, nrow = 100)
```

## m2
```{r}
#average marginal effect
ame <- marginaleffects(m2)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)

ame <- marginaleffects(m2_hc_only)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)

ame <- marginaleffects(m2_nonhc_only)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)
```

## m3
```{r}
#average marginal effect
ame <- marginaleffects(m3)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)


ame <- marginaleffects(m3_hc_only)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)



ame <- marginaleffects(m3_nonhc_only)
summary(ame, conf_level = .997)
```

## m4
```{r}
#model 4
ame <- marginaleffects(m4)
ame_sum <- summary(ame, conf_level = .997)
print(ame_sum, nrow = 100000)
```


```{r}
ame <- marginaleffects(m4_hc_only)
ame_sum <- summary(ame, conf_level = .997)
print(ame_sum, nrow = 100000)
```


```{r}
ame <- marginaleffects(m4_nonhc_only)

```
